Settings.Name: NPC
Settings.Tooltip: Choose which NPC to display.

Settings.Name: Page
Settings.Tooltip: Choose which options page to display.

Settings.Name: Page
Settings.Tooltip: Choose which options page to display.

Settings.Name: Enabled
Settings.Tooltip: Enable or disable Boss General.

Settings.Name: MaxLevel
Settings.Tooltip: The Boss level cannot be higher than X.

Settings.Name: LevelBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Level the Boss to the Party Level + X.

Settings.Name: Downscaling
Settings.Tooltip: Downlevel the Boss to the Party Level.

Settings.Name: ExperienceLevel
Settings.Tooltip: Whether the Boss's base Experience Reward will match their scaled Level.

Settings.Name: Spells
Settings.Tooltip:
Give Boss casters a random number of spells up to X * Level.

The given spells match the Boss archetype from a custom dynamic class-based system.
Works with any modded spells.

Settings.Name: SpellBlacklist
Settings.Tooltip:
The names of spells to not give through Boss Spells sepearated by ';'

Such as:
Lighting Arrow;True Strike

Settings.Name: Enabled
Settings.Tooltip: Enable or disable Standard General.

Settings.Name: MaxLevel
Settings.Tooltip: The Standard level cannot be higher than X.

Settings.Name: LevelBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Level the Standard to the Party Level + X.

Settings.Name: Downscaling
Settings.Tooltip: Downlevel the Standard to the Party Level.

Settings.Name: ExperienceLevel
Settings.Tooltip: Whether the Standard's base Experience Reward will match their scaled Level.

Settings.Name: Spells
Settings.Tooltip:
Give Standard casters a random number of spells up to X * Level.

The given spells match the Standard archetype from a custom dynamic class-based system.
Works with any modded spells.

Settings.Name: SpellBlacklist
Settings.Tooltip:
The names of spells to not give through Standard Spells sepearated by ';'

Such as:
Lighting Arrow;True Strike

Settings.Name: Enabled
Settings.Tooltip: Enable or disable Player General.

Settings.Name: MaxLevel
Settings.Tooltip: The Player level cannot be higher than X.

Settings.Name: LevelBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Level the Player to the Party Level + X.

Settings.Name: Downscaling
Settings.Tooltip: Downlevel the Player to the Party Level.

Settings.Name: ExperienceLevel
Settings.Tooltip: Whether the Player's base Experience Reward will match their scaled Level.

Settings.Name: Spells
Settings.Tooltip:
Give Player casters a random number of spells up to X * Level.

Settings.Name: Enabled
Settings.Tooltip: Enable or disable Summon General.

Settings.Name: MaxLevel
Settings.Tooltip: The Summon level cannot be higher than X.

Settings.Name: LevelBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Level the Summon to the Party Level + X.

Settings.Name: Downscaling
Settings.Tooltip: Downlevel the Summon to the Party Level.

Settings.Name: ExperienceLevel
Settings.Tooltip: Whether the Summon's base Experience Reward will match their scaled Level.

Settings.Name: Spells
Settings.Tooltip:
Give Summon casters a random number of spells up to X * Level.

The given spells match the Summon archetype from a custom dynamic class-based system.
Works with any modded spells.

Settings.Name: SpellBlacklist
Settings.Tooltip:
The names of spells to not give through Summon Spells sepearated by ';'

Such as:
Lighting Arrow;True Strike

Settings.Name: Enabled
Settings.Tooltip: Enable or disable Boss Bonus.

Settings.Name: HP
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss HP by X.

Settings.Name: PercentHP
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Boss HP by X%.
0.05 means each Boss recieves a 5% max health bonus.

Settings.Name: AC
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss AC by X.

Settings.Name: Attack
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Attack Rolls by X.

Settings.Name: DamageBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Damage by X.

Settings.Name: Initiative
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Initiative by X.

Settings.Name: Physical
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Boss Physical Ability Score by X, based on its highest physical stat.
( Strength or Dexterity )

Settings.Name: Casting
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Boss Casting Ability Score by X, based on its spellcasting stat.
( Intelligence, Charisma, or Wisdom )

Settings.Name: Strength
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Strength Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Dexterity
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Dexterity Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Constitution
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Constitution Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Intelligence
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Intelligence Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Wisdom
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Wisdom Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Charisma
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Boss Charisma Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Experience
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Experience awarded by the Boss by X.

Settings.Name: PercentExperience
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Experience awarded by the Boss by X%.
0.05 means each Boss recieves a 5% experience bonus.

Settings.Name: Size
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Boss Size by X%.
0.05 means each Boss recieves a 5% Size bonus.
Size influences Weight and maximum HP.

Settings.Tooltip:
